titleStmt.title: Furem, a quo res nostras iudicio repetere poterimus, occidere non licet ; Si vir & vxor rem aliquam ita emerint, vt superstiti tota deferatur, & deinde simul in naue perierint, vt nosci non possit, vter prior mortuus sit, res ad mariti hæredes quasi diutius viuentis deferetur

notesStmt.note: Contains Latin verses related to theses at Cambridge University.
Place and date of publication suggested by STC (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Cambridge University Library.
